using MoneyGram.Common;
using MoneyGram.AgentConnect.DomainModel;
using SERVICE = MoneyGram.AgentConnect.Repository.AgentConnectService;
using DOMAIN = {DomainNamespace};

namespace MoneyGram.AgentConnect.Repository.EntityMapper.DomainModelExtensions
{
    public static class {ModelType}Extensions
    {
        public static SERVICE.{ModelType} ToService(this DOMAIN.{ModelType} domainModel, Agent agent)
        {
            var serviceModel = AcMapper.Map<DOMAIN.{ModelType}, SERVICE.{ModelType}>(domainModel)
                .AdditionalOperations(domainModel, agent);
            return serviceModel;
        }

        public static SERVICE.{ModelType} AdditionalOperations(this SERVICE.{ModelType} svcModel, DOMAIN.{ModelType} domainModel, Agent agent)
        {
            DomainTransformExtensions.CopyAgentData(svcModel, agent);
            DomainTransformExtensions.NullifyWhiteSpaceStrings(svcModel);
            ServiceTransformExtensions.ProcessSpecifiedDomainToService(svcModel, domainModel);
            return svcModel;
        }

        public static void DefineMappings()
        {
            AcMapper.CreateMap<DOMAIN.{ModelType}, SERVICE.{ModelType}>(){CreateMapExtensions}
                .IgnoreSpecifiedProperties();
        }
    }
